[Some of the codes, the more cooler ones, like HP and Moonjump were made by Gamerjin. We both worked on this together, he gave me permission to release the codes. They work on base game, no support for update 1.1]

[Inf HP Character 1]
D3000000 30000000
B08C6B34 00000000
D9000000 000017F4
D6000000 000017E8
D2000000 00000000

[Inf HP Character 2]
D3000000 30000000
B08C6B34 00000000
D9000000 000067B0
D6000000 000067A4
D2000000 00000000

[Inf HP Character 3]
D3000000 30000000
B08C6B34 00000000
D9000000 0000B1CC
D6000000 0000B1C0
D2000000 00000000

D2000000 00000000

[Moonjump]

[Chr. Modifier: Dickson]
D3000000 00000000
004C5DCC 0009FFFF
004C94D0 02090000
D2000000 00000000
{Change characters, leave the area or reload the game to see the change}

[Max Gem]
DD000000 00000108
1824E4CE 00000009
D2000000 00000000
{Press START+R On Colony 9 Gem Stall Man.}

[Mega Heat]
DD000000 00000101
D3000000 0824E4CE
C0000000 0000000F
10000000 0000012C
DC000000 00000008
D1000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Press A+R On Colony 9 Gem Stall Man.}

D2000000 00000000
{Press L button.}

[HP Gem Pct. All Chr. - Save]
D3000000 308C6B34
60000000 00000000
B0000000 00000000
000013A0 0000012C
D2000000 00000000
D3000000 308C6B34
60000000 00000000
B0000000 00000000
0000635C 0000012C
D2000000 00000000
D3000000 308C6B34
60000000 00000000
B0000000 00000000
0000AD78 0000012C
D2000000 00000000
{Put any HP UP Gem on your weapon first gem slot.}

[Strength Gem Pct. Ch 1 - Save 2]
D3000000 308C6B34
60000000 00000000
B0000000 00000000
000013D8 00006000
D2000000 00000000
{Put any STRENGHT UP Gem on your weapon second gem slot.}

[Weather: Rain]
DD000000 00000240
004C7508 00020002
004C7510 00000001
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000280
004C7508 00020003
004C7510 00000001
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000220
004C7508 00030002
004C7510 00000002
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000210
004C7508 00000005
004C7510 00000002
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000204
004C7508 00000001
004C7510 00000000
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000208
004C7508 00010001
004C7510 00000001
D2000000 00000000
{L+Up: Bionis Leg, Colony 6 and Fallen Arm. 
L+Down: Eryth Sea. 
L+Left: Makna Forest. Fog on Satorl Marsh.
L+Right: Snowstorm on Valak Mt. Meteor Shower on Erith Sea.}
